snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include the announcement that Steven Sinofsky, the former head of Microsoft’s Windows division, has become a board partner of Andreessen Horowitz, a venture capital firm. Plus, a satire on the Silicon...
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include the announcement that Steven Sinofsky, the former head of Microsoft’s Windows division, has become a board partner of Andreessen Horowitz, a venture capital firm. Plus, a satire on the Silicon Valley state of mind.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Former Windows Boss Goes to Andreessen, and Dear Miss Disruption
